title: Genk vs Liverpool LIVE score: TV time, team news and live stream details
text:
Liverpool will aim to bounce back from dropping Premier League points at Manchester United by tackling Genk on Wednesday night.

The Reds were rescued by a second half goal by substitute Adam Lallana to grab a point at Old Trafford and now travel to the Luminus Arena to keep their Champions League bid on the right rails.

Holders Liverpool have lost to Napoli and beaten RB Salzburg, in a 4-3 thriller, so far in the Champions League to sit second in Group E.

Belgian side Genk are currently bottom of the division having been pumped 6-2 by RB Salzburg before notching a point versus Napoli.

Genk XI:

Liverpool XI:

Follow all the LIVE action here with Mirror Football.

The game will be televised on BT Sport 2 and can be live streamed on the BT Sport app.
description: Liverpool travel to Luminus Arena to face Genk in the Champions League on Wednesday night. Kick off 20.00 BST
